data.description: How to produce documents with PDF::Reuse
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
PDF::Reuse::Tutorial is a dummy module. It is written only for the
    POD documentation. The documentation is necessary if you want to use
    PDF::Reuse. That module is already big and has documentation for
    each function, but you need also commented examples and hints about
    how to use it.
